about_the_game:
Dream Garage is a game for lovers of rare and beautiful cars. You will receive fasteners every 3 hours and every 9 hours you will receive a part from the car, from which you can assemble the assembly and then the whole car! For each assembled car, you will receive a random number from 1 to 9999. Collect a collection of cars with rare license plates.

There is a rarity of cars in the game:
BASIC -the percentage of parts falling out on cars of such rarity is ~ 60%
LUX -the percentage of loss of parts on a car of such rarity is ~ 30%
DREAM -the percentage of loss of parts on a car of such rarity is ~ 10%

Each car consists of 3 components: body assembly, chassis, interior

Each node consists of 10 parts:
Body assembly: hood, fender, doors, windows, grille, front bumper, rear bumper, headlights, taillights, mirrors
Chassis: engine, gearbox, gimbal, front suspension(lever), rear suspension(lever), shock absorbers, springs, radiator, exhaust, tank
Interior: steering wheel, torpedo, carpet, ceiling, front seats, rear seats, door trim, tunnel, dashboard, seat belts

To create a node, 10 parts are required of which it consists and 30 fasteners (10 each bolt, washer, nut)
To create a car, you need 3 nodes (interior, body, chassis) and paint of any color purchased in the in-game store

When creating crafting, you can use parts, nodes of different quality, but remember that the percentage of loss is not equal to the number of used parts of different quality, but is calculated from the percentage of loss of parts in the game! Have a good crafting experience!

When you create a car, you get a random number for it from 1 to 9999. You can also buy a new number in the in-game store, with random digit generation. Try your luck!

At the start of the game, you are given 1 free car space, if you want to increase your garage, then you can buy a parking space in the store, which increases the space by 1 slot.

You can sell all the cars, components, parts, fasteners, and items from the in-game store on the marketplace.
detailed_description:
Dream Garage is a game for lovers of rare and beautiful cars. You will receive fasteners every 3 hours and every 9 hours you will receive a part from the car, from which you can assemble the assembly and then the whole car! For each assembled car, you will receive a random number from 1 to 9999. Collect a collection of cars with rare license plates.

There is a rarity of cars in the game:
BASIC -the percentage of parts falling out on cars of such rarity is ~ 60%
LUX -the percentage of loss of parts on a car of such rarity is ~ 30%
DREAM -the percentage of loss of parts on a car of such rarity is ~ 10%

Each car consists of 3 components: body assembly, chassis, interior

Each node consists of 10 parts:
Body assembly: hood, fender, doors, windows, grille, front bumper, rear bumper, headlights, taillights, mirrors
Chassis: engine, gearbox, gimbal, front suspension(lever), rear suspension(lever), shock absorbers, springs, radiator, exhaust, tank
Interior: steering wheel, torpedo, carpet, ceiling, front seats, rear seats, door trim, tunnel, dashboard, seat belts

To create a node, 10 parts are required of which it consists and 30 fasteners (10 each bolt, washer, nut)
To create a car, you need 3 nodes (interior, body, chassis) and paint of any color purchased in the in-game store

When creating crafting, you can use parts, nodes of different quality, but remember that the percentage of loss is not equal to the number of used parts of different quality, but is calculated from the percentage of loss of parts in the game! Have a good crafting experience!

When you create a car, you get a random number for it from 1 to 9999. You can also buy a new number in the in-game store, with random digit generation. Try your luck!

At the start of the game, you are given 1 free car space, if you want to increase your garage, then you can buy a parking space in the store, which increases the space by 1 slot.

You can sell all the cars, components, parts, fasteners, and items from the in-game store on the marketplace.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i5 5500 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i5 5500 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel hd630
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.12
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

name: Dream Garage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 5500 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 5500 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Dream Garage is a game in which you collect a dream garage, with the best cars. As you get items for being in the game, you use them to create assemblies and cars! Create crafts of rare cars! Sell parts you don't need and buy missing parts! Build the best and rarest collection!
